spell1.name: JEET KUNE DO
spell1.description: Strike the targeted enemy with Jeet Kune Do, reducing the cooldown of Dragon's Defense with every hit.

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: The first four strikes each deal 30 damage, while the fifth strike deals 55 damage

attributes.label: INTERVAL
attributes.value: The first four strikes have an interval of 0.45s between them, while the fifth strike has a 0.67s interval from the fourth strike

spell2.name: YAT JEE CHUNG KUEN
spell2.description: Dash forward to pursue the targeted enemy and unleash a flurry of attacks.

attributes.label: PERCENTAGE DAMAGE
attributes.value: Deal damage equal to 2.7% of the target's Max Health

spell3.name: LIVING CHI
spell3.description: Become living Chi to boost his speed, damage, and attack range, delivering stronger punches while reducing the cooldown of Dragon's Defense.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: 100% range boost to K'un-Lun Kick and Yat Jee Chung Kuen

spell4.name: K'UN-LUN KICK
spell4.description: Dash forward, delivering a flying kick when hitting an enemy or reaching full range, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Damage increases with lower enemy health.

spell5.name: HARMONY RECOVERY
spell5.description: Cross legs and channel Chi, slowly gaining Bonus Health.

spell6.name: CRANE LEAP
spell6.description: Perform up to three consecutive jumps while airborne.

spell7.name: DRAGON'S DEFENSE
spell7.description: Assume a defensive stance with the boost of Chi to block incoming attacks and gain Damage Reduction. Once he exits the defensive stance, he gains Bonus Health and can strike back with Yat Jee Chung Kuen.

spell9.name: CHI ABSORPTION
spell9.description: Assist in taking down enemies allow him to absorb their Chi and gain Bonus Health.
